trans-unit.source: Converts <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> objects from one type to another.
trans-unit.target: Converte <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objetos de um tipo para outro.

trans-unit.source: Most commonly, the SizeFConverter type converter is used to convert <xref:System.Drawing.Font> instances to and from their corresponding string representations.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o conversor de tipo SizeFConverter é usado para converter <xref:System.Drawing.Font>representações de cadeia de caracteres de instâncias para e de seus correspondente.</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: Access the <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter> class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Acessar a <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter>classe por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeFConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeFConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the converter can convert from the type specified to the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o conversor pode converter do tipo especificado para o <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> digitar, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the specified type is a <xref:System.String>, this method will always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo especificado for um <xref:System.String>, esse método sempre retornará `true`.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> por meio do qual o contexto adicional podem ser fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> the represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>representa o tipo que você quer converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the conversion can be performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar a conversão pode ser executada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeFConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeFConverter"> </xref> pode converter um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> por meio do qual o contexto adicional podem ser fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo que você deseja converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esse conversor puder realizar a conversão caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto fornecido para o tipo deste conversor, usando as informações de contexto e a cultura especificadas.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para usar como a cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para converter.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor convertido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto de valor especificado para o tipo especificado, usando as informações de contexto e a cultura especificadas.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If null is passed, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: Se null for passado, a cultura atual é assumida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para converter.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>para converter o parâmetro de valor.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor convertido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> with the specified property values using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> com os valores de propriedade especificada usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> por meio do qual o contexto adicional podem ser fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing property names and values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contêm valores e nomes de propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the new <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o objeto não pode ser criado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether changing a value on this object requires a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeFConverter.CreateInstance*> method to create a new value.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a alteração de um valor no objeto requer uma chamada para o <xref:System.Drawing.SizeFConverter.CreateInstance*>método para criar um novo valor.</xref:System.Drawing.SizeFConverter.CreateInstance*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a set of properties for the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> type using the specified context and attributes.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um conjunto de propriedades para o <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> usando o contexto especificado e os atributos de tipo.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns the properties of a <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> type regardless of the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esse método sempre retorna as propriedades de um <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>Digite independentemente do `value` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> por meio do qual o contexto adicional podem ser fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to return properties for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para qual propriedades são retornadas.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Attribute> objects that describe the properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Attribute>objetos que descrevem as propriedades.</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> que contém as propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> type supports properties.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se o <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> tipo oferece suporte às propriedades.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> por meio do qual o contexto adicional podem ser fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
